name: wrld.js
description: A JavaScript API for beautiful 3D maps

scripts.build-dist: npm run clean && mkdir dist && browserify -s WRLD src/wrld.js > dist/wrld.js
scripts.build-min: npm run build-dist && uglifyjs -c -m < dist/wrld.js > dist/wrld.min.js
scripts.watch: npm run build-dist && watchify -s WRLD src/wrld.js -o dist/wrld.js -v --debug

author: WRLD
